## Create MSM Java-Object

```{r echo=TRUE, warning=TRUE}
library(deisotoper)
load(system.file("extdata", name='TP_HeLa_200ng_filtered_pd21.RData', package = "deisotoper"))
MSM <- jCreateMSM(TP_HeLa_200ng_filtered_pd21)
```


## Plot Of The Summary

```{r fig.cap="Plotted summary of the MSM object",  fig.retina=3, fig.height=6, fig.width=7}
library(lattice)

bwplot(Value ~ Attribute, 
       data=jSummaryMSM(MSM),
       scales = list(y = list(log = TRUE), x = list(rot = 45)))
```
